definition: "silk" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 120), occurring in 红, 绿, 累 etc/also pr. [mi4]
end/conclusion/to come to an end/to terminate (sth)
the end/end point/finishing line (in a race)/destination/terminus/CL:個|个[ge4]
end (of a performance or sports match)/last round of testing in the imperial examinations
in the end/after all is said and done

sentences.english: One day the cloud really will be big.
sentences.chinese: 终有一天云会真的变大。

sentences.english: Someday you would had known the turth what I did all for you just because love.
sentences.chinese: 终有一天你会邃晓，我所做的齐备仅仅是因为爱。
人，终是矛盾而天真的啊。

sentences.english: Was subsequently greeted with at least a car accident died, should be a "red blood splash, " was intended.
sentences.chinese: 后来终遭致车祸而死，应了“红血飞溅”之意。

sentences.english: Winds and waves stop sometimes, hoisting the sails to travel in the vast sea.
sentences.chinese: 长风破浪终有时，直挂云帆济沧海。

sentences.english: In the survey, will expose right outside a woman forever.
sentences.chinese: 在众人调查下，终揭发永权在外面有女人。

sentences.english: I will come to visit you one day.
sentences.chinese: 终有一天我会来拜候你。

sentences.english: The decision made bcdfds. com this Commission shall be regarded as final and binding upon both parties.
sentences.chinese: 该委员会的决定是终，对双方均约束力。

sentences.english: Ou take away the rapist, I want you to give it to me one day.
sentences.chinese: 你这个借走我初吻的色魔，终有一天我要你还给我。

sentences.english: This is the reason reason our pare notnts sll the time encourage us to read abundance books.
sentences.chinese: 这是为啥咱们的爸妈终是鼓励咱们要多读书的理由。

sentences.english: They want their liberty - and one day, they will have it.
sentences.chinese: 他们渴望自由，而且终有一天将获得自由。

sentences.english: Maybe Wenger is right and this side will grow into fearless conquerors.
sentences.chinese: 也许，温格是对的，他的球队终会长成无畏的征服者。

sentences.english: Your family must always come first.
sentences.chinese: 你的家庭绐终必须放在第一位。

sentences.english: Spend a beautiful matching, but The Flood of Years.
sentences.chinese: 如花美眷，终不过似水流年。

sentences.english: The long multi-layered process is ending.
sentences.chinese: 漫长而且又牵涉许多层面的争取过程，终告一段落。

sentences.english: No matter the thick ink or soft pastels, they both are suitable.
sentences.chinese: 浓墨也好，淡彩也罢，终是相宜。
